name: Maid for You ~ Otome Visual Novel (Pre-order)
name_original: Maid for You ~ Otome Visual Novel (Pre-order)
description:
Maid for You is a romantic otome visual novel about a selfless maid working at the Haxhold Estate.

Melina (name changeable) has one dream: to see her younger brothers graduate from high school. She's been searching for a job that gives her a secure income to support her family. But year after year, it always come down to changing jobs.

One day, her uncle has an accident and Melina is asked to be his replacement. Melina enters the Haxhold Estate.

One has a scarred heart; the other has a mental condition; and another has a dark past. All three of them hold a secret and Melina is grasping on one as well.

3 romance routes
40+ CGs
10 chibi CGs
12 original soundtracks
12 endings
Unlockable 'Special' gallery

Genres: Visual Novel, Otome, Romance
Platforms: Windows, Mac and Linux
Language: English (UK)
Screen Resolution: 1280 x 720 px

Visit the official website here. What do I get when I pre-order Maid for You?
  • Maid for You Alpha (currently consists of the common route)
  • Maid for You Beta (James' route in Feb 2019)
  • Maid for You Full Version (when available)
  • Free Steam key (when available)
